name: Φ–Π Axiom Box — Semantic Projection & Causal Evaluation
intent: Formalize the semantic projection Φ and causal evaluation Π that transform geometric deviation into truth-bearing structure.
constraints: Φ is linear and idempotent on semantic subspaces.
Π is monotone with respect to semantic refinement.
Π∘Φ defines the canonical evaluation of projected form.
Φ∘Π forms the semantic embedding of evaluated truth.
Tri-Unity: δ, Φ, Π form a closed non-commutative cycle.
